meanings.definition: Of or relating to the north or northern regions.
meanings.sent1: The boreal winds brought a chill to the northern lands.
meanings.sent2: The boreal animals are adapted to the cold climate.
meanings.sent3: The boreal snowflakes danced in the sky, painting the world white.
meanings.sent4: His boreal personality was as cold as the Arctic.
meanings.sent5: The boreal landscape was a breathtaking sight of snow-covered trees.

meanings.definition: A tree or plant of the northern regions.
meanings.sent1: The boreal stood tall among the other trees in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The boreal provides shelter for many animals in the cold north.
meanings.sent3: The boreal whispered secrets to the wind, swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: She was a boreal, rooted in her beliefs like the ancient trees.
meanings.sent5: The boreal's leaves rustled softly in the gentle northern breeze.
